response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $15,000. However, I understand that the true value is subjective and depends on your specific needs and goals. Therefore, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive introductory price of $20,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or if you have any questions about how this product can enhance your operations.", "product_price": 20000}
